mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of John w., Ella, Lillian, Wilson H. and Elizabeth Quesenberry
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of John w., Ella, Lillian, Wilson H. and Elizabeth Quesenberry John W. was a ward until he reached 21 years of age by 07.24.1895 Ella was a ward until she was 21 years of age by 07.24.1895 Lillian was a ward until she reached 21 years of age. Milton Quesenberry, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 4 ,Pages 461-463, in the Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
